name: Sunlight Perfumed After Wash Floral Bliss
description: Sunlight Perfumed Afterwash boosts freshness with deodorizing technology that can fight strong odours you usually find on clothes everyday!  Allows you to dress confidently everyday.  It gets rid of 7 stubborn odours leaving your clothes fresh with a long-lasting fragrance. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
